code: var updateUserData=function updateUserData(body){var property=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'points';if(localStorage.getItem('W2M-JWT-Token')){var fetchOptions={method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json',token:localStorage.getItem('W2M-JWT-Token')},body:JSON.stringify({userData:body,property:property})};fetch('http://localhost:5000/update-user-data',fetchOptions).catch(function(err){return console.log('fetching data update error',err.message);});}else console.log('No W2M JWT token provided');};export default updateUserData;
